mesquite.lib

Class MesquiteImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • mesquite.lib.MesquiteImage

  • public abstract class MesquiteImage
extends java.awt.Image
    This class provides utilities to recover images from local file or URL, automatically choosing depending whether Mesquite is being run as applet or application.
